titleStmt.title: Tirumālpuram, Ruined Viṣṇu Temple, time of Rājarāja I Cōḻa, year 10

licence.p: This work is licenced under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

msContents.summary: Endowment of 20 kaḻañcu of gold to ūrār of Vēḷkaḷa Veṇpākkam. Three kaḻañcus of interest every year were to be used by trustees of temple for recitation of tiruppatiyam , beginning with the expression kōlanaṟkuḻal of a hymn now lost by (?) donor’s father Kāyavāṉ Arunilai.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Creation of the file on the repository

div.p:
kāntaḷūr cālai kalam aṟutta
kōrājarājakesarivanmaṟkku yāṇṭu 10ttāvatu

tāma
tu tāmar ṉnāṭṭu śrī govintapāṭi puṟattu veḷkaḷa veṇpā
roṅkai-y Eḻuttu coḻaṉāṭṭu vaṭakarai-p piṭavūr-nāṭṭu-k kaṇakku
ṭai yāṉ Arunilai śrī tarṣaṇaṉ-āṉa muventa-p piṭavūr ve
ḷār kaiyāl yāṅkaḷkoṇṭu kaṭava cempoṉ tanma ka
ṭṭaḷaiyāl tuḷai 2 10 Ippoṉ koṇṭa paricāvatu Iv-āṭṭai
puraṭṭ’ Ātimutal kaḻañcinvāy tiṅkaḷ iraṇṭumā-p policaiyāl or-āṭ
ṭaikku venta pon 3 10

I-p poṉṉil ivar tamappaṉār tāyāvā naruṉilai-y-ā
ṉa muventappiṭavūr veḷār śrī govintapāṭi āḻvāṉ viṇṇappam ce
kolanaṟkuḻal Eṉum tiruppatiyam Ivāḷvār tiruviḻāviṉ Eḻāṉāḷāl
ṭiyāṭiṉa paridaināyakaṉmārkku Irukaḻañcuṅ kēṭ-p picca kōyil nampimārkku
kaḻañcum āka policai mu-k-kaḻañcu poṉṉum śastrādittaval āṭṭāṇṭu toḻumā
ḷvār śrī kāyamñ ceykiṉṟa nampimārē taṇṭi iṭu-v i-p patākavum iṭomākil
tiruvāṇai maṟaiyum paṭṭu tēvakanimakaḷ tāṅkaḷ vettil tāṅkaḷ veṇṭu
taṇṭam iṭa-p peṟuvārkaḷ ākavum mivarkaḷ iṭṭa taṇṭam iṟuttum i-ṉ ṉn nivantam ippaṭi
Iṭa-k kaṭavom ākavum I-pparicoṭṭi Iṭṭukk’ Uṭutto muventappiṭavūr veḷārkku
veḷkaḷa veṇpākkatturom

ūrār paṇikka iśilālekai veṭṭiṉeṉ
āṟaiyāṉa śrī govintapāṭi ācāriyaneṉ

ivai-y eṉ eḻuttu i
tu śrīvaiṣṇavarrirakṣai
Hail! Prosperity! Until the twenty-ninth year of the reign of Kō-Rājakesarivarman, alias Śrī-Rājarājadeva, who, in his life of growing strength, during which, — ...
